0.8.8.name: wordpress/zelist
0.8.8.description:
WordPress Links, the right way.

Run a directory on your WordPress powered website.

0.8 : first stable version

  • Full use of WordPress taxonomies
  • Extension of _links table
  • Links Custom Fields
  • Links Inline Edit
  • Custom Permalinks
  • Ajax back-end
  • Front-end and back-end site submit
  • API to check for spam and duplicates (version 1.0)

View site: http://www.zelist.net/

View working directories : http://sante.cornee.fr | http://www.ecololiste.com/ | http://musique.lestelechargements.fr/
